User_Comment: The new invoice layout is confusing and my clients are complaining they can't find the payment link.
The app crashes every single time I try to scan a receipt, it's completely unusable right now.
Why is there still no option to run a consolidated report across multiple entities? This is basic functionality.
The recent UI update introduced way too much white space, I have to scroll twice as much to see the same data.
I've been waiting 6 months for the payroll tax fix, this delay is unacceptable and costing me penalties.
My bank feed for Chase has been disconnected for three days and support hasn't replied to my ticket.
The Shopify integration is broken, inventory numbers aren't syncing and I'm overselling stock.
The 'smart' matching rule is matching transactions to the wrong vendors, creating more work for me.
I waited on hold for 45 minutes only to be told to 'clear my cache', terrible customer service.
We need the ability to edit invoices after they are sent without voiding them, the current process is too rigid.
The cash flow forecast is wildly inaccurate, it doesn't account for recurring bills correctly.
Documentation for the new API endpoints is sparse and full of errors, developers can't work with this.
Please revert the dashboard changes, the font is too small and the contrast is terrible for accessibility.
Auto-categorization is failing for 50% of my expenses, I'm spending hours fixing it manually.
Still no landscape mode for iPad? It's 2024, come on.
The split payment feature is buggy, it deducted the wrong amount from two employees' checks.
Another price hike? The software hasn't improved enough to justify a 20% increase.
Transparency on the roadmap is non-existent, we have no idea when critical bugs will be fixed.
Why can't we attach documents to transfer transactions yet? This is a compliance nightmare.
The bulk send feature is timing out for batches larger than 50 invoices.
Forcing a password reset every 30 days is annoying and doesn't actually improve security, please implement standard 2FA.
The CRM sync wiped out my contact notes, I need a backup restored immediately.
The sales tax calculation for digital goods in the EU is incorrect, please fix this ASAP.
The sidebar menu is too cluttered, I can't find the settings page half the time.
Estimates sent from the phone app are missing the company logo, it looks unprofessional.
Reporting speed is abysmal, it takes 5 minutes to generate a simple P&L.
We need custom leave types, the default options don't cover our industry requirements.
The 'undo' button is missing from the new reconciliation screen, one mistake means starting over.
Since the last update, the system logs me out every 10 minutes, it's disrupting my workflow.
Crypto payments are nice but can we please just get Stripe payments to work reliably first?
The chatbot is useless and I can never reach a human agent when I have a critical issue.
Mileage tracker is draining my battery and missing trips, I've had to switch to a spreadsheet.
Webhooks are firing twice for the same event, causing duplicate entries in our database.
Allow us to hide modules we don't pay for, I'm tired of seeing 'Upgrade' buttons everywhere.
The export to Excel formats numbers as text, making the spreadsheet useless for calculation.
The Android widget hasn't updated in weeks, it's showing a balance from last month.
Contractor onboarding is too manual, we need a self-service portal urgently.
Performance has degraded significantly over the last few months, pages take forever to load.
Bank rules are being ignored since the patch on Tuesday.
Slack notifications are spammy, we need granular control over what gets posted.
The automated sales tax filing missed a deadline and now I have to pay a fine.
Still no multi-language support? I'm losing international clients because of this.
The grey-on-grey text is impossible to read, please consider users with visual impairments.
Drill-down functionality is broken on the balance sheet, it just spins and times out.
FaceID login fails 50% of the time, I have to type my password constantly.
I lost three hours of data entry because the session timed out without a warning saving.
OCR is misreading '8' as '0' consistently, I can't trust the automation.
Why can't I customize the pay stub layout? My employees are confused by the current format.
Bulk un-reconcile is dangerous without a confirmation step, I accidentally undid a whole month.
Asana integration is one-way only, it doesn't push time entries back to the accounting software.
I'm actively looking for alternatives, the lack of support for long-standing bugs is the final straw.
We still can't attach files larger than 2MB to invoices, which is too small for our design blueprints.
The new dashboard graphs are pretty but lack data density, I need numbers not just colors.
Keyboard shortcuts conflict with my browser defaults, let us remap them.
Offline mode creates sync conflicts when I reconnect, it corrupted two invoices.
Employee self-service portal is down again, they can't access their W2s.
Bank feed duplicates are back, I have to manually delete hundreds of lines.
The VAT return report doesn't support the new flat rate scheme yet.
Zapier connection disconnects every 24 hours, it's not reliable for automation.
Stop pushing 'new features' and fix the core stability issues first!
